name: Change Over Time (Beta/Demo)
description:
Heya, Im Manlad, and this is a new (and first) RPG game  I made called Change Over Time (Not the official name yet, if you have suggestions lmk :]).

 This is just a demo/beta version of the game to show you what to expect when/if I finish this game.

Basically its a game where history repeats itself over and over again and you have to do the right things to finally end this cycle.

I know that its using the default RPG Maker style, but I really dont care about that, I just want to make a fun game :]

Let me know what you think! Comments, ideas, suggestions, good or bad criticism, Ill take them all!
